description: Side-by-side existing (E) and new (N) site plans showing the lot at 1232 N. Jefferson St. The existing plan shows the single-family residence, garage, and trellis to be demolished. The new plan shows the proposed detached ADU at rear with 5'-4" rear setback, electric heat pump water heater, and ductless split AC.
key_content: Existing residence: 72' one-story single-family, (E) garage 20' wide
Trellis 11'-6" to be demolished for ADU
(N) Electric Heat Pump Water Heater at ADU
Property frontage on N. Jefferson St.: 86'
Site Plan Notes: grading 6" fall in first 10 ft from foundation, storm drain pollutant controls
Water meter location: front-left near street
Electrical service location: left (west) side of property
NOT SHOWN: parking space dimensions or count
NOT SHOWN: total lot area (sq ft)

drawing_zones.content: (E) Existing Site Plan at 1/8" = 1'-0" showing current lot with SFR, garage, trellis to be demo'd, utilities
(N) New Site Plan at 1/8" = 1'-0" showing proposed ADU at rear, heat pump, ductless AC, modified landscaping
Site Plan Legend and Site Plan Notes (3 notes: codes, pollutant discharge, grading)
ADU West and Ideal Designs logos
Title block: PAGE A1, project info vertical along right edge
